Moo::SemanticMapping

Moo::SemanticMapping Class Reference

This class is a simple mapping between an effect handle and an EffectConstant, stored with the name of the semantic. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a simple mapping between an effect handle and an EffectConstant, stored with the name of the semantic.
